"The Prize Shop":
"About the Prize Shop

Here, you can purchase prizes using \"Stars \". Stars can be obtained in a few ways, including by completing Round Goals.

The initial lineup will be made available from the start of the event, but after the event, further prizes will be added. Do your best, and you will be able to purchase more prizes!
